Class MarketingContent<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • Actionable
      • com.upsight.android.marketing.internal.content.MarketingContent<T>

    T - The model for this MarketingContent.

    public class MarketingContent<T>
extends Actionable
    Representation of marketing content.
